title: Cafe and CIA
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Salad bar, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Brazilian pay by weight buffet. Many vegan choices, including salads, rice and beans, and a couple of cooked veggies such as yam, sweet potato, spinach. Staff does not speak English but understands vegano/vegetariano and will point out what you can eat. If you are vegan and not sure also ask if the dish is sem leite pronounced sim lehchee meaning without milk.
